Milei's Argentina 'omnibus' bill faces gauntlet after clearing first hurdleArgentine President Javier Milei's "omnibus" bill, a sprawling reform package ranging from tax hikes to privatizations, has cleared its first hurdle in Congress with a green light from a lower house committee. It now faces far tougher obstacles. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 16:29:35 GMT TAUI7Q3WYRLQPOHSEJ2PUWNM54 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mileis-argentina-omnibus-bill-faces-gauntlet-after-clearing-first-hurdle-2024-01-25/Adam Jourdan世界美洲
Russia plane crash in Belgorod - what we know so farRussia has accused Ukraine of shooting down a military transport plane carrying 65 captured Ukrainian soldiers to a prisoner exchange. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 16:29:23 GMT GHU4SI2Y6FOA5HISOWNCUOFA2U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/plane-crash-western- Russia-what-we-know-so-far-2024-01-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Blinken hails progress in construction of Angola's Lobito rail corridorU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken hailed progress in the construction of the Lobito Corridor, a rail link key to metals exports from the central African Copperbelt, during a visit to Angola on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 16:10:55 GMT TNECEFZVANNQZBXWHS5GZE4WHA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/blinken-hails-progress-construction-angolas-lobito-rail-corridor-2024-01-25/Reuters世界非洲
World Court to rule next week on Ukraine case against Russia on MH17, discriminationJudges at the World Court will hand down a judgment on Wednesday in a case in which Ukraine accused Russia of violating an anti-terrorism treaty by funding pro-Russian forces, including militias who shot down a passenger jet, and discrimination. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 16:03:26 GMT PVYU5AR5CJL5PAFQ6TRGMRN3DU https://www.reuters.com/world/world-court-rule-next-week-ukraine-case-against-Russia-mh17-discrimination-2024-01-25/Reuters世界
Rampant extortion reveals 'corrosive' hole in Mexico security strategyWhen farmers in a tiny Mexican village last month hacked to death suspected drug cartel members who were squeezing them for protection money, it shone a harsh light on one of the country's biggest security problems: extortion. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:59:05 GMT 4GPXGKYLXVM3BIJ2S6N6FEHPGE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/rampant-extortion-reveals-tropic-hole-mexico-security-strategy-2024-01-25/Dave Graham世界美洲
Top French court rules large parts of new immigration law go against constitutionParts of a contested new French immigration law go against the constitution and must be scrapped, France's Constitutional Council said on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:55:31 GMT BE7OFL4VIVJRPMZ2SGV贾德尔https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/top-french-court-rules-large-parts-new-immigration-law-go-against-constitution-2024-01-25/Tassilo Hummel世界欧洲
Second French warship arrives in Red Sea region - armyA second French warship has arrived in the Red Sea region as part of efforts to ensure freedom of navigation, the French army said on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:49:37 GMT KJVV3PBVRJOEDGNRONHOKXZE6M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/second-french-warship-arrives-red-sea-region-army-2024-01-25/Reuters世界中东
UN rights chief voices concerns over Italy-Albania migrant pactA deal allowing Italy to build reception camps in Albania for thousands of migrants arriving by sea raises concerns about arbitrary detention and living conditions, the U.N. human rights chief said on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:31:26 GMT QNZRYTL4EJKKDBFNTUHF5YFDGI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/un-rights-chief-voices-concerns-over-italy-albania-migrant-pact-2024-01-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Over 2,000 people abused in German Protestant Church - studySome 2,225 people suffered sexual violence in Germany's Protestant Church at the hands of 1,259 suspected perpetrators over the last eight decades, a study found on Thursday, warning that the scandal was probably far deeper. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:23:09 GMT CIH3ZBBW3NPRXOVJOZOFIDFXSI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/over-2000-people-abused-german-protestant-church-study-2024-01-25/Nette Noestlinger世界欧洲
Iraq, U.S. agree set up talks on future of U.S.-led coalition - statementBaghdad and Washington have agreed to set up a committee to start talks on the future of the U.S.-led military coalition in Iraq with the aim of setting a timetable for a phased withdrawal of troops and the coalition's end, Iraq's foreign ministry said. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:04:34 GMT EKYAZ2DZT5O7BBDYWW3WMBBDKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/iraq-us-agree-set-up-talks-future-us-led-coalition-statement-2024-01-25/Reuters世界
UK and US sanction senior Houthis over Red Sea shipping attacksBritain and the United States on Thursday said they had imposed co-ordinated sanctions on four key Houthi figures for their roles in supporting or directing attacks on commercial shipping in the Red Sea. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 14:54:18 GMT CBDOH4QU6VMKZM4NVRQEIF4ZWA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uk-us-sanction-senior-houthis-over-red-sea-shipping-attacks-2024-01-25/Reuters世界中东
